description:
The FlavorAccessTemplate serializer is not working as it always returns a body like the following:

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<flavor_access>
  <access/>
</flavor_access>
title: Fix FlavorAccessTemplate serializer in FlavorAccess API extension

comments.content:
The FlavorAccessTemplate serializer is not working as it always returns a body like the following:

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<flavor_access>
  <access/>
</flavor_access>
